channel.title: Popup interface for players/highscores/commands?
channel.description: How would I go about making a interface pop up to show like players that are online and one to show like different commands that are available? and maybe one to show highscores? Sorry if this is really simple.. Im kinda new to this, i havent coded in a long time

item.title: Popup interface for players/highscores/commands?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

final Client x = (Client)p;
Is the declaration of the second player (Or whomever is to be shown on the scores).
So you’d do something like:
c.sendFrame126("("+x.combatLevel+") "+x.playerName, int);
Note: you need to replace the word int with an actual int…

Read full topic

item.title: Popup interface for players/highscores/commands?
item.dc:creator: @shapesnatch shapesnatch
item.description:
@shapesnatch wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:7, topic:532879”][quote author=shapesnatch link=topic=651672.msg4369140#msg4369140 date=1380249280]

^ dont loop through a number.

how would you do it?
[/quote]loop through the actual indexes available.

int[] available = {6,3,2,5,7,1,0}; final int MAX_AVAILABLE = 500; for (int i = 0; i < MAX_AVAILABLE; i++) { // }
will through a lot of outofbounds exceptions, null pointers, etc when working with players like so

for (Player p : PlayerHandlers.players) { if (p != null) { //if (p.properName.equalsInoreCase(str)) { //if name check needed final Client x = (Client)p; } //} }[/quote]

what about to show the players level though next to their name?

Read full topic

[/quote]
how would you do it?[/quote]loop through the actual indexes available.

int[] available = {6,3,2,5,7,1,0}; final int MAX_AVAILABLE = 500; for (int i = 0; i < MAX_AVAILABLE; i++) { // }
will through a lot of outofbounds exceptions, null pointers, etc when working with players like so

for (Player p : PlayerHandlers.players) { if (p != null) { //if (p.properName.equalsInoreCase(str)) { //if name check needed final Client x = (Client)p; } //} }

item.title: Popup interface for players/highscores/commands?
item.dc:creator: @shapesnatch shapesnatch
item.description:
@shapesnatch wrote:

I dont have one set up yet, im working on that still. I want them to open by a command though, like ::commands or ::players

would this work for player list?

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("playerlist")) { int line = 8147; for (int i = 1; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { Client p = c.getClient(i); if (!c.validClient(i)) continue; if (p.playerName != null) { c.getPA().sendFrame126("@dre@" + p.playerName, line); line++; } } c.getPA().showInterface(8134); c.flushOutStream(); }

and how could i make it show their lvls too?

Read full topic
